author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...IMELDA FORECAST TO BECOME A HURRICANE TOMORROW MORNING... ...HURRICANE WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FOR ISLAND OF BERMUDA...
summary: ...IMELDA FORECAST TO BECOME A HURRICANE TOMORROW MORNING... ...HURRICANE WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FOR ISLAND OF BERMUDA... As of 5:00 PM EDT Mon Sep 29 the center of Imelda was located near 27.7, -77.3 with movement N at 9 mph. The minimum central pressure was 986 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 65 mph.

As of 5:00 PM EDT Mon Sep 29 the center of Imelda was located near 27.7, -77.3 with movement N at 9 mph. The minimum central pressure was 986 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 65 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Imelda (AT4/AL092025)
